entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
